on_ready.name: on_ready
on_ready.description: A series of actions that are executed upon bot initiation.

on_member_join.name: on_member_join
on_member_join.description: A series of actions that are executed upon a new member joining a server. Instructions are executed in the server that the member has joined.
actions: Sends a customizable welcome message to the new member's private messages.
Posts a customizable welcome message to the channel of choice in the server.

on_member_remove.name: on_member_remove
on_member_remove.description: A series of actions that are executed upon a member leaving a server.
actions: Sends a customizable farewell message to the new member's private messages.
Posts a customizable welcome message to the channel of choice in the server.

help.name: help
help.description: Opens up the help page. Type any command after help to see it in more detail.

random.name: random
random.description: A random item generator for all your random needs.

arguments.number: Generates a random number between in the inclusive range of the next two inputs. Defaults to [-1000, 1000].
arguments.word: Searches Wikipedia with specified query, returns random image on wiki page.

add.name: add
add.description: A *powerful* math engine ... made for addition only.

arguments.numbers: a list of numbers separated by spaces, can be decimals or whole numbers, positive or negative
